project_preview_description.text: A single page application that connects seniors with volunteers who want to help improve their quality of life.

project_description.text: A web application that connects seniors with volunteers who wants to help improve their quality of life. This project was part of a contract to convert existing Front-end only web app to a full stack web app. Additional features added include: User registration/authentication, geolocation search, chat system.

siteMetadata.title: Jerry Chuang's Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: A portfolio powered by Gatsby and Prismic to showcase portfolios and blogs.
siteMetadata.author: Jerry Chuang
